item.title: What a week. How do you eat an elephant? One bite at a time. How do you run 300 miles in one week? One mile at time. 300 miles. 55 hours. That was hard. Smile, or you're doing it wrong #runtok

item.title: While others are getting wasted on New Year's Eve, I'll be running into 2026. Literally. Just signed up for Across the Years in Arizona. It's a timed race on a loop course with options for everyone: 6 hours, 12 hours, 24 hours, 48 hours, 72 hours, or the
item.description: While others are getting wasted on New Year's Eve, I'll be running into 2026. Literally. Just signed up for Across the Years in Arizona. It's a timed race on a loop course with options for everyone: 6 hours, 12 hours, 24 hours, 48 hours, 72 hours, or the

item.title: Having my family at the finish line was the best moment of the entire week. I'm so incredibly blessed to have a family that supports me through every crazy idea and adventure. They don't just tolerate this‚Äîthey show up, keep me alive, and cheer me on when

item.title: I'm not here to judge anyone's choices. But I am here to challenge you: Dry January. One month. No alcohol. That's it. See how you feel. See how you sleep. See how you perform. Start 2026 by doing something hard that's good for you. Drop a üôã if you're in.

item.title: Lost 5 pounds to start 2026. Burned 13,000 calories. This was my 3rd fastest 100 mile finish. Something I haven't done in three years. Guess the 300 mile week paid off.We started in 2025 and ended in 2026. Across the Years was a blast. #runtok

item.title: 100 miles. 71 loops. Two years in one run. Started on December 31st, 2025. Finished on January 1st, 2026. Ran from one year into the next. Ended 2025 strong and started 2026 even stronger. 3rd fastest 100-mile time of my life. The old legs still have some

item.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
